title: Appliance Premium*, Fitness Studio, 2 Inch Blinds*, Designer Lighting*
posting_body: Located in the heart of the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex, Post Oak Place is situated in Euless, just minutes from Highway 360.
This terrific location is convenient to the Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport, the Irving Convention Center, the University of Dallas, Downtown Dallas, and Downtown Fort Worth.
Post Oak Place offers newly renovated homes, a swimming pool and heated spa, a fitness studio, and a leash-free dog park!
Our apartments feature hardwood-style flooring, walk-in closets, gourmet kitchens with pantries, wood-burning fireplaces, and built-in bookshelves.
Want more info on this unit?
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 570 Sq.
Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $388 pet fee(non-refundable) per pet.
Pet rent is $25 per month, per pet.
There is a weight limit of 75 pounds per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
Please call our leasing center for our complete pet policy details.
